titles.title: Life Is Wonderful, Oh So Wonderful!

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Life is wonderful, Oh so wonderful! Life is wonderful now to me. I let Jesus in; He changed everything. Life is wonderful now!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Since the Savior came into my heart, Joy unspeakable fills every part. I am going on with my Lord. Life is wonderful now!{/lang-eng}
